name: RegexTest
content:
RULES of the forum before posting.
Then post a new thread in this forum (click here if you can't find the post thread button) for introduce yourself

[align=center]:Relax5:

have fun[/align]
[align=center]

Have more questions? :confused: Be sure to check out the FAQ section for answers.[/align]


[align=center]enjoy the forums and welcome to your newcommunity![/align]

[align=right]-General :bye:[/align]','Introduce yourself to us! Here's an example thread','','closed','closed','closed','','introduce-yourself-to-us','','','2012-03-14 12:33:17','2012-03-14
